title: My Friend can't go on to League
body: I don't know we tryed to re-download it but it didn't work and  when he open's it something pops up like fvgfji something like that. Can you help me ?

replies.body: Its okay I fixed it, thank you for helping tho. :D

We want to help your friend but we need more details to better understand the issue.  Have him reach out to us directly through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll help him out individually.
